instruction: List five benefits of using artificial intelligence in marketing.
output:
1. Automation of repetitive tasks like data collection and analysis, freeing up time for more creative and strategic work. 
2. Improved customer personalization and targeting using data-driven insights and predictions.
3. Improved customer segmentation resulting in a more customized user experience.
4. Ability to measure and monitor marketing campaigns in real-time. 
5. Faster development of AI-driven marketing campaigns.
